sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, source_id, compound_name, definition, secondary_ids, other_names, CASE WHEN source_id IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE '' || source_id || '' END AS compound_link, formula FROM ApidbTuning.CompoundAttributes

sqlQuery.name: Synonyms
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ca.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, apidb.tab_to_string(set(CAST(COLLECT(n.name) AS apidb.varchartab)),', ') as synonyms FROM ApidbTuning.CompoundAttributes ca, chebi.names n WHERE ca.ID = n.compound_id(+) GROUP BY ca.source_id

sqlQuery.name: PathwaysCount
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT count (DISTINCT pc.pathway_id) AS pathway_count, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, pc.chebi_accession AS source_id FROM ApiDBTuning.PathwayCompounds pc GROUP BY chebi_accession

sqlQuery.name: DefaultStructure
sqlQuery.sql: WITH def_st AS (SELECT s.compound_id, s.structure FROM chebi.structures s, chebi.default_structures ds WHERE s.type='mol' and s.dimension='2D' AND s.id = ds.structure_id) SELECT ca.SOURCE_ID, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, CASE WHEN ca.id = def_st.compound_id THEN def_st.structure ELSE EMPTY_CLOB() END as default_structure FROM ApidbTuning.compoundAttributes ca, def_st WHERE ca.ID = def_st.COMPOUND_ID(+)
